nodes.text: A Human male served the Galactic Republic as a quartermaster during the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY, he was posted on the planet Taris during the Taris Resettlement Initiative. On the behalf of the Taris Reconstruction Authority, he greeted a Cathar settler in the Olaris Spaceport.

The quartermaster first appeared in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as an ambient non-player character on Taris with the nameplate "Tired Quartermaster".
